title: Message to the Knights of Columbus.
text:
My dear Mr. Carmody:

I cordially congratulate you, and through you the entire membership of the Knights of Columbus, upon the celebration of the Golden Anniversary of the foundation of an organization which has to its credit so many helpful contributions to education, fraternal benevolence, and the relief of human distress. Yours faithfully,

HERBERT HOOVER
garbage_collected: [Mr. Martin H. Carmody, Supreme Knight, Knights of Columbus, New Haven, Connecticut]
